keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
map yd LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink         # "yank download"
map <a-[> closeTabsOnLeft                           # Alt + [ to close tabs left
map <a-]> closeTabsOnRight                          # Alt + ] to close tabs right
map <a-\\> closeOtherTabs                           # Alt + \ to close all other tabs
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab  # Open link in new tab & switch to it
